messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A serial killer is on the loose in the station, and must be detained!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Today is National 'Hunt a Wabbit' Day.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Fluffy Alert

Unidentified furry objects detected coming aboard Bunny City 94. Beware of Adorable-ness.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a number of mice have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Bunny City 94, please stand-by.
